name: Istoria (itch)
description:
Istoria

"Home was always watched over by the Gods. Every hundred years, their gilded home of Istoria would drift into view from the heavens above. Blessed rains and seeds would shower our world, granting it new life."

"No such blessings were given this time. Instead of feasts, we were given famine. Our fields now lie barren under a rain of crystalline dust. Have we committed some heretical crime to deserve this?"

"Or has something far worse befallen the Gods?"

Journey across Istoria as you take on the tales of Asentzio, Miren and Irunai. Cross through seven chapters, vanquishing fiends and finding the truth at Istoria's peak.

---

To all of you...

First of all, I'd like to thank everyone who's tried Istoria in its current state for the few minutes of their time. 

I wish it could have been more, but to be honest, there simply was no time.

A challenge when accepting to participate in something like this one is that you plan a project based on your expectations.

I did not expect to suddenly lose all of my remaining time, a week and a half before deadline. As much as I wish I could have been free to spend that final week implementing everything I'd planned in the document I simply didn't have the time or energy do so as we  got to the end of this week.

I would like to thank my Musician and Artist who did an amazing job getting the assets done for Istoria and to them I want to promise that their time will not have been in vain.

Istoria may be a speck of what it should have been but I won't let these hours go to waste. Once my time returns to me in the winter holidays, I'll make sure to finish the game and give you what I wanted to in the first place: A true game, not this shell of a
demo.

I'd like to thank everyone on the Discord for the moments we shared. I'm really devastated that it had to come to this after all my efforts.

Good luck everyone in the contest, hope to see you all around the forums soon!

Istoria will be beautiful one day.

Timespiraled
